INT32 INSTLIB::CONTROL_STATS_EVENT_ADDRESS::CheckKnobs (CONTROL_STATS_HANDLER ch, VOID *val)

Detailed Description

Controller for detecting address or symbol and a count and a generic simple event. Use -stop_address [address|address:count|symbol|symbol:count|address:count]
